metadata.Name: Russian-Language Multimodal Dataset
metadata.Description: A multimodal dataset of 420 Russian-language scientific papers from 7 domains (Economics, History, IT, Journalism, Law, Linguistics, Medicine). It includes the full text, abstract, tables, and figures for the task of automatic text summarization.
Provider: A.P. Ershov Institute of Informatics Systems
metadata.Paper Title: Russian-Language Multimodal Dataset for Automatic Summarization of Scientific Papers
Affiliations: A.P. Ershov Institute of Informatics Systems
metadata.Abstract: The paper discusses the creation of a multimodal dataset of Russian-language scientific papers and testing of existing language models for the task of automatic text summarization. A feature of the dataset is its multimodal data, which includes texts, tables and figures. The paper presents the results of experiments with two language models: Gigachat from SBER and YandexGPT from Yandex. The dataset consists of 420 papers and is publicly available on https://github.com/iis-research-team/summarization-dataset.
